s0001: Lu Zhonglian was a man of Qi.
s0002: He delighted in extraordinary and unconventional strategies, yet refused to take office or hold position, preferring to maintain high principles.
s0004: During Zhao King Xiaocheng's time, Qin king sent Bai Qi to break Zhao's Changping army, killing over 400,000 before and after. Qin troops then advanced east to besiege Handan.
s0005: Zhao king feared, the feudal lords' rescue troops none dared attack Qin army.
s0006: Wei King Anli sent general Jin Bi to rescue Zhao, but fearing Qin, stopped at Dangyin without advancing.
s0007: Wei king sent guest general Xin Yuan Der secretly enter Handan, through Lord Pingyuan tell Zhao king: 'What Qin urgently besieges Zhao for is previously contending with Qi King Min for strength to become emperor, then again abandoning it.
s0008: Now Qi King Min already much weakened. Currently only Qin is strongest in world. This is not necessarily greedy for Handan, their intent wishes again to seek becoming emperor.'
s0009: If Zhao truly sends envoys to honor Qin King Zhao as emperor, Qin will certainly be pleased, withdraw troops depart.'
s0010: Lord Pingyuan hesitated, not yet decided.
s0011: At this time Lu Zhonglian happened to travel in Zhao, meeting Qin besiege Zhao. Heard Wei would have Zhao honor Qin as emperor, thus saw Lord Pingyuan saying: 'The matter will be handled how?'
s0012: Lord Pingyuan said: 'How dare Sheng speak of matters!
s0013: Previously lost 400,000 troops outside, now again internally besieged in Handan cannot leave.
s0014: Wei king sent guest general Xin Yuan Der to have Zhao make Qin emperor, now that person is here.
s0015: How dare Sheng speak of matters!'
s0016: Lu Zhonglian said: 'I initially considered you the world's worthy lord. Only now do I know you are not the world's worthy lord.
s0017: Where is Wei guest Xin Yuan Der?
s0018: I request for you to reproach and send him back.'
s0019: Lord Pingyuan said: 'Sheng requests to introduce and present him to master.'
s0020: Lord Pingyuan thus saw Xin Yuan Der saying: 'Eastern regions have Master Lu Zhonglian, now that person is here. Sheng requests to introduce, have him meet the general.'
s0021: Xin Yuan Der said: 'I have heard of Master Lu Zhonglian, Qi's high scholar.
s0022: Der is subject's minister, missions have duties. I do not wish to see Master Lu Zhonglian.'
s0023: Lord Pingyuan said: 'Sheng has already revealed it.'
s0025: Lu Zhonglian saw Xin Yuan Der but said nothing.
s0026: Xin Yuan Der said: 'I see those dwelling in this besieged city all have requests of Lord Pingyuan.
s0027: Now I observe master's jade appearance, not one with requests of Lord Pingyuan. Why stay long in this besieged city without leaving?'
s0028: Lu Zhonglian said: 'The world considers Bao Jiao one who died without followers and eulogies, all are wrong.
s0029: If the multitude does not understand, then for one's self.
s0030: That Qin is a state that abandons ritual and righteousness to prize first merit. Weighs its scholars, enslaves its people.
s0031: If they recklessly become emperor, exceeding to govern the world, then Zhonglian has only to tread East Sea and die. I cannot bear to be their people.
s0032: The reason for seeing the general is to aid Zhao.'
s0033: Xin Yuan Der said: 'How will master aid it?'
s0034: Lu Zhonglian said: 'I will make Wei and Yan aid it, Qi and Chu already aid it.'
s0035: Xin Yuan Der said: 'Yan then I request to follow.
s0036: As for Wei, I am Wei man. How can master make Wei aid it?'
s0037: Lu Zhonglian said: 'Wei has not seen the harm of Qin claiming emperor.'
s0038: If Wei sees the harm of Qin claiming emperor, will certainly aid Zhao.'
s0039: Xin Yuan Der said: 'What is the harm of Qin claiming emperor?'
s0040: Lu Zhonglian said: 'In former times Qi King Wei once practiced benevolence and righteousness, led world feudal lords to attend court at Zhou.
s0041: Zhou poor and small, feudal lords none attended court, only Qi alone attended.
s0042: After over a year, Zhou King Lie died. Qi arrived later. Zhou angered, announced to Qi: "Heaven collapses earth splits, Son of Heaven descends from mat.
s0043: Eastern vassal minister because Qi arrived late, then decapitated."
s0044: Qi King Wei angrily said: 'Scold! You are mother's slave!'
s0046: Therefore alive attend court at Zhou, dead scold it. Truly cannot bear their demands.
s0047: That Son of Heaven is like this, nothing to wonder at.'
s0048: Xin Yuan Der said: 'Does master not see the lackey?
s0049: Ten people following one person, is it strength not equal and wisdom not matching?
